## builder package

A package used to build various assets from momentum design designers to engineer-consumable resources.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Builder](./builder.builder) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The Builder class to be extended by scoped Builder classes. |
|  [Builders](./builder.builders) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The Builders class to manage a collection of provided builders. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BuilderConfig](./builder.builderconfig) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Core configuration Object for Builder. |
|  [BuildersConfig](./builder.buildersconfig) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Configuration Object for the Builders class. |
|  [BuildersData](./builder.buildersdata) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Dynamic data Object for the Builders class. |
|  [TokensBuilderConfig](./builder.tokensbuilderconfig) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Configuration Object for tokens Builder. |
